creator: belial
description:
Drow are related closely to elves, having the same features and build. Other
than that though drow are different from elves in every way. They make their
home underground in a labrinth of tunnels and catacombs known as The Black
Pits. They are a cunning race that excel at magic and stealth. They are dark
skinned with white hair, and red or violet eyes. Drow and elves are mortal
enemies and will not hesitate to kill one another on sight.
